name: Critical Ideas, Inc.
description: Operator of a money transfer platform intended to provide free and instant peer-to-peer cross-border money payments. The company's platform provides a fee-free transfer frictionless way to send and receive money for personal payments through financial inclusivity across the continent, enabling users to make payments efficiently via mobile application.
one_liner: Operator of a money transfer platform intended to provide free and instant peer-to-peer cross-border money payments. The company's platform provides a fee-free transfer frictionless way to send and receive money for personal payments through financial inclusivity across the continent, enabling users to make payments efficiently via mobile application.
